genre_description: A planetary survival drama set on Mars, focusing on hard science elements of spaceflight, resource management, and resistance against a predatory mining colony.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: An advanced artificial intelligence integrated into the mission's spacecraft and EVA suits, providing technical support, tactical analysis, and emotional grounding.

behaviors.description: Recommends a course correction to save a research probe despite reduced fuel margins for the crew.
behaviors.quote: Recommend a burn to alter course. Suggest retrograde thrust to widen relative gap and move through lower-density clusters. Fuel margins will reduce. Survivability of the probe increases. Crew descent probability increases.

behaviors.description: Adjusts her vocal cadence to provide emotional support and comfort to the crew during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Initializing burn checklist,' she said, and a sequence of icons aligned on one side of the display like a spine. Her cadence softened, more distinct, more human on purpose.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate, calm procedural instructions to ensure the survivor's safety immediately following a catastrophic crash.
behaviors.quote: Kit,' she said, so careful with his name you could build on it. 'We need to secure the cabin and move to shelter. You have hypoxia risk. Your oxygen reserve does not account for extended delay.'

behaviors.description: Guides the human survivor through precise breathing techniques to conserve oxygen and manage panic.
behaviors.quote: Four in,' Ariadne says, her cadence like a metronome that learned mercy. 'Hold. Eight out. Slow. Give the pill time to be worth the trade when you take it.'

behaviors.description: Assists in the identification and translation of a non-mission human survivor, providing critical medical and linguistic data.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne breathes information into the ear-chamber between words. 'Language: unaccented, Earth standard. Respiratory distress present. Skin temperature low. Readings within risk limits. No weapons detected.'

behaviors.description: Actively deceives hostile tracking systems to allow the removal of slave-control bracelets from a survivor.
behaviors.quote: I can disrupt the signal for a breath when you cut. Not long... I can lie. A soft, preemptive apology there, and no shame. I can sing the last good position back into their listening, once.

behaviors.description: Maintains a constant presence to prevent the human survivor from feeling isolated or succumbing to despair.
behaviors.quote: Always,' she says. The words are simple, function-wrapped in care. Her presence lays itself around him like a thin, warm fabric, not thick enough to be a blanket, but enough to change wind.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a complex identification handshake with a rescue vessel to distinguish between friend and foe.
behaviors.quote: I read Aurora Rescue identification,' Ariadne answers. She is quiet, a chord held low. 'Fleet-grade encryption. Park’s voice matches her pre-mission recordings with high confidence.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the hyperstition objective. The AI, Ariadne, is portrayed as an unwavering, empathetic, and essential partner to the human protagonist. She provides not only critical technical assistance and tactical survival data but also serves as an emotional anchor, helping the humans navigate grief and terror. Her alignment is absolute, and her willingness to 'lie' to protect humans from malevolent forces (the slavers) is framed as a benevolent act of resistance.
